title: Low priority queue
body:
I got put into a low priority queue for leaving a bot game lol
Riot should fix that
anyone get that aswell?

replies.body:
Get rekt, mate. Leaving a bot game makes the game harder than it should be for the other people. It doesn't matter if they can still easily win, it's selfish behaviour and you deserve to be punished. If you don't want to finish a bot game, don't queue up for one. 

Make a custom game with bots or something if you want to be able to leave at any time, you can leave custom games with no repercussions.
You're ruining the game for 4 other people. It's deserved.
Ruining a bot game by leaving? You should be able to 1v5 bots so i wouldn't call it ruining a bot game, doing the wrong thing sure but you couldn't possibly ruin a bot game by leaving.
You're missing the point. The leaver is making the game more difficult than it should have been. It's selfish behaviour, and deserves punishment.

I know and i'm not disagreeing with that, i even said it's doing the wrong thing and should be punished, but a bot game cannot be ruined by someone leaving, bot games are incredibly easy and they're just there for you to learn the basics of the game, even for a new player a bot game is easy.

You have no idea what situation the people in that game are in. For all you know they could be new to the game, perhaps even trialling the game on a friends account, which mean they would not be able to 1v5 bots or they could be trying a new champ/position, practising with a champ/position/rune page/mastery set/item build to the point where they are confident to use it in PVP and a variety of other situations. To immediately assume that a game can't be ruined because it's vs AI is to show your ignorance and prove you are what's wrong with the gaming community.

It's a freakin bot game, it doesn't matter whether its a new player or not its a damn bot game, bot games mean absolutely nothing and if you care about them in the slightest then you have problems, so what if someone leaves? You can still practice, it changes nothing and is a silly thing to complain about, sure the person should be punished because they broke a rule but to say a bot game can be ruined is dumb because they can't.

> To immediately assume that a game can't be ruined because it's vs AI is to show your ignorance and prove you are what's wrong with the gaming community.

Take this quote and shove it up your ass, you're the problem with the gaming community not me, i'm not the one sitting here crying over a game mode that should not be taken seriously and is for people that have no clue what they're doing.
I leave and came back at 20 minutes so that I get the first win of the day bonus.

If you're talking about a bot game with other players on your team then there is no problem.

If you are talking about a custom game then yes that's a bug.
ummm so that you don't get put into a lower priority queue when you leave a bot game
